title: Pulimada
overview: In a serene village near the wilderness, news of a man-eating tiger terrifies the community. The once peaceful atmosphere turns tense leading to a curfew and unrest. Vincent, an unmarried police constable awaits his marriage with great excitement. On the wedding day, a shocking revelation shatters Vincent's world. Fueled by rage and anger, Vincent embarks on a dangerous journey for companionship through the village that is still grappling with the looming threat of the man-eating tiger.
